comments:
OS: RHEL4u3 GTK (x86) / Solaris 10 1/06 GTK (sparc)
Build date: I200603231133
Steps:
 1. Open Profiling and Logging perspective
 2. Click Profile button on the toolbar or select Run > Profile from menu
 3. Create a new Statistical Launch Configuration (Windows system, Linux system, or Apache system, etc.) and configure appropriate settings.
 4. Click "Profile"
 5. Verify the agent is attached by using Profiling Monitor view
 6. Click "Start Monitoring" on the view toolbar
 7. Open "Agent Control" view and select any items interested
 8. Open "Statistical Graph Summaries" view
 9. Drill down to the item whose color is to be changed
10. Click "Show Advanced Descriptor Settings" button on the top right of the view
11. Click a button next to "Color" attribute to open a color chooser
    But color chooser doesn't open due to NullPointerException (also no error dialog opens so it seems that nothing happens.)

Expected:
    Color chooser opens.
